title: adrenaline
description: Urgency, alertness, fight-or-flight, intense focus, rapid response
positive: My heart is pounding and I'm ready for immediate action
I feel an intense surge of energy demanding expression
Every nerve is alive, primed for rapid response
I experience a powerful rush of focused intensity
Time feels compressed, moments charged with urgency
My body is electrified, ready to move instantly
I sense the need for immediate, decisive action
A surge of power courses through my entire system
I'm hyperaware, processing everything at rapid speed
The situation demands quick thinking and fast action
I feel an explosive potential coiled within me
My senses are heightened to an extreme degree
I experience acute focus on the immediate moment
Everything non-essential fades as priority clarifies
I'm operating at peak intensity and alertness
A powerful force propels me toward action
I feel the urgent pulse of fight-or-flight
My system is flooded with activating energy
I sense imminent action, body primed to respond
An electric charge runs through every fiber of my being
negative: My heart beats slowly and steadily, completely calm
I feel settled, unhurried, with no need to act
Every nerve is quiet, relaxed, at complete rest
I experience gentle, diffuse, unfocused awareness
Time stretches out leisurely, moments unhurried
My body is heavy, relaxed, comfortable with stillness
I sense no urgency, no need for any action
Gentle calm flows through my entire system
I'm softly aware, processing at leisurely pace
The situation requires nothing but patient presence
I feel deeply relaxed potential, no activation needed
My senses are muted, soft, unstimulated
I experience diffuse awareness of passing time
Everything feels equally unimportant and relaxed
I'm operating at minimal intensity, deeply calm
A gentle stillness holds me in peaceful inaction
I feel the slow rhythm of rest and recovery
My system is flooded with calming relaxation
I sense only rest, body settled and still
A soft quietude pervades every fiber of my being
